about_the_game:
The Level 5 Mastery Pack is built for the most dedicated capsuleers. With 6 months of Omega time, 3,000 PLEX for trade and customization, and a Master Bundle featuring 1.75 million Skill Points and two Standard ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerators, this is the ultimate resource pack. Includes MCT and Skill extractors for complete flexibility. 

Contents: 

  • 6 months Omega 

  • 3,000 PLEX 

  • Master Bundle (1,750,000 SP + 2 Standard ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerators) 

  • 2 Multiple Character Training (MCT) 

  • 10 Skill Extractors 

Single purchase per account.
detailed_description:
The Level 5 Mastery Pack is built for the most dedicated capsuleers. With 6 months of Omega time, 3,000 PLEX for trade and customization, and a Master Bundle featuring 1.75 million Skill Points and two Standard ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerators, this is the ultimate resource pack. Includes MCT and Skill extractors for complete flexibility. 

Contents: 

  • 6 months Omega 

  • 3,000 PLEX 

  • Master Bundle (1,750,000 SP + 2 Standard ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerators) 

  • 2 Multiple Character Training (MCT) 

  • 10 Skill Extractors 

Single purchase per account.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
